0.5.0.name: railscast-theme-ng
0.5.0.description: Atom syntax theme based on Ryan Bates (@rbates) RailsCasts TextMate theme. Fork of https://github.com/ericfreese/atom-railscast-theme with deprecations fixed.

readme:
# RailsCast Syntax Theme

Syntax theme based on the RailsCast TextMate theme.

Fork of https://github.com/ericfreese/atom-railscast-theme with deprecations fixed.

![railscast theme](http://i.imgur.com/rUrA8OB.png)
